Given its unique benefits and superior craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than $80 to you. To secure this opportunity, I am offering you the chance to own it for $95 today. Don't miss out on this exclusive deal! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
